CmdLine: echo "Europe/Berlin" > /etc/timezone &&     dpkg-reconfigure tzdata &&     apt-get -y update &&     apt-get -y upgrade &&     apt-get -y install         rabbitmq-server
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo "[{rabbit, [{loopback_users, []}]}]." > /etc/rabbitmq/rabbitmq.config &&     service rabbitmq-server start &&     rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management &&     service rabbitmq-server stop
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: service rabbitmq-server start && while true; do sleep 1d; done
Commands.Name: entrypoint
